Maritime Connectivity Platform (MCP) documentation
==========================================================

This documentation describes Maritime Connectivity Platform from the overall architecture to the technical details of the MCP reference implementation.

We encourage you to use our Google Group at https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/maritimeconnectivity for general usage questions and new releases.

This document aims to make you familiar with developing secure applications and services for MCP in particular.
